thread.title: Pregnant Amal Clooney reveals just a hint of her baby bump
thread.title_full: Pregnant Amal Clooney reveals just a hint of her baby bump | Daily Mail Online

author: Jason Chester for MailOnline
title: Pregnant Amal Clooney reveals just a hint of her baby bump
text:
Pregnant Amal Clooney revealed a hint of her growing baby bump as she made her first appearance since confirming she is expecting twins on Tuesday afternoon.
The lawyer wife of Hollywood veteran George caught the eye in a vibrant red winter coat from Stella McCartney while venturing out in London without her famous husband.
Adding to her look with a black minidress and matching ankle boots, Amal, 39, looked typically stylish as she made her way towards a waiting car.
Scroll down for video
She's expecting: Amal Clooney revealed her growing baby bump as she made her first appearance since conforming the sex of her unborn twins on Tuesday afternoon
Be the lady in red like Amal in Stella McCartney £2014 Stella McCartney Pre-Fall 2017
Shop current line here
Buy now
Amal Clooney was spotted in London this week for the first time since her pregnancy news broke. You could barely catch a glimpse of her bump though under her billowing coat!
The Human Rights Barrister donned a grey dress with tights and boots layered with a maxi length coat by Stella McCartney.
For us regular beings, this coat is not up for grabs right now as it hails from the pre-fall 2017 collection, but you can shop the current line directly at the website (click right).
We love the bold scarlet hue of this outerwear, the large lapels and double breasted finish. Plus, once Amal is no longer pregnant, that belt will nip her in at the waist nicely.
Keen to be the lady in red? Check out some similar alternatives in the line up below from New Look, MSGM and more.
* PRICES MAY NOT BE AS ADVERTISED ...NOW GET ONE LIKE IT £710 MSGM tapered waist long coat at Farfetch (now £497)

The Beirut born international human rights specialist completed her look with a heavily fringed handbag, while a pair of tinted sunglasses were perched atop her head.
Amal, who is expected to give birth to twins in June, carried a sheaf of papers under one arm ahead of another busy day in the capital.
Her appearance comes shortly after George's mother Nina revealed the couple are expecting one of each sex.
Looking good: The lawyer wife of Hollywood veteran George caught the eye in a vibrant red winter coat venturing out in London without her famous husband
In an interview with RadarOnline , the 77-year-old former city councilwoman shared her excitement over the expected June arrival for George and his wife Amal, 39.
'It will be one of each! Yes, a boy and a girl. That’s what I’ve been told,' she said from her Kentucky home. 'How marvellous! My husband and I are extremely excited.'
However, while she and her husband, broadcast journalist Nick Clooney, are elated about becoming grandparents again, they've yet to be let in on any clues when it comes to names for the children.
'I haven’t been told their names,' said Nina. 'That is George and Amal’s department.' Life change: The 55-year-old actor told Rencontres de Cinema that he was on the receiving end of some classic banter, after it emerged he was about to become a father to twins aged 56
On Monday Georg e spoke for the first time of his 'excitement' at the news that he and Amal will be welcoming twins this summer
The 55-year-old actor said: 'We are really happy and really excited. It's going to be an adventure. We've sort of embraced it all with arms wide open.'
Speaking to French programme Rencontres de Cinema , the star said his friends were 'very supportive' of the news, despite having given him a hard time at first.
Really excited: George broke his silence on Monday about impending fatherhood
New parents: He's preparing to welcome twins with wife Amal (pictured October)
'Then it got really quiet,' he said. 'And they all just started making baby crying noises, and the whole table just busted up laughing.'
A source previously claimed the actor was 'excited but nervous' about becoming a father.
The insider told People : 'He is excited about the kids, but also has the normal amount of nerves that come with being parents.'
The star - who will be 56 by the time the babies arrive - has said that he feels inspired by another older father.
George explained that he's inspired by 89-year-old French actor Jean-Paul Belmondo, who had a child with his second wife, Nathalie Tardivel, when he was 70.
'So, I'm feeling a little better about being 56 by the time [they come],' Clooney admitted.
Happy couple: George and Amal wed back in 2104 in Venice, Italy
Us Weekly reported that Amal has already selected a London hospital where she will give birth this summer, with a backup selected in New York City in case they will be travelling.
She has also designated a bedroom in their newly renovated, $12million 17th century manor just outside of London to be a nursery for the twins.
Another insider predicted that the human-rights lawyer will make a great mother. '(Amal) strikes me as someone who'll be a fantastic mother: intelligent, loving, funny, smart, nurturing. She doesn't seem like someone who will let kids get away with being Hollywood children.'
Earlier this month, The Talk's Julie Chen confirmed the couple's double joy after confirming the news with the actor.
